trans-unit.source: Specifies the direction in which the system arranges minimized windows.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a direção na qual o sistema Organiza janelas minimizadas.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada pela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.ArrangeDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Arranged vertically, from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: Organizados verticalmente, de cima para baixo.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Válido com o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"> </xref> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"> </xref> valores de enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight>

trans-unit.source: Arranged horizontally, from left to right.
trans-unit.target: Organizados horizontalmente, da esquerda para a direita.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopRight><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
Arranged horizontally, from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Organizados horizontalmente, da direita para esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.TopLeft><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
Arranged vertically, from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Organizados verticalmente, de baixo para cima.

trans-unit.source: Valid with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomLeft> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition.BottomRight><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ArrangeStartingPosition"></xref> enumeration values.
